overview: A granola-cruncher, too Earth-conscious to swat away a fly that lands on his cheek, bicycles to the countryside. He aims to celebrate the titular creature's mating season and protect its path across a country road. Unfortunately, other humans driving by aren't quite so respectful of natureâ€™s dignity or his. Ari Gold co-wrote and co-directed with Jamie Babbit.
title: Frog Crossing
